CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 3, 1971, pg. 19, reads: "Champagne? - Randall Harper (left), one of the hosts for the party given in honor of the three visiting dancers from Boston, offers champagne to Mrs. Carolyn McAdoo and her husband Garland McAdoo and Miss JoAnn Walker, a counselor at Duquesne University. Miss Walker was also one of the party's hostesses. - All Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Two women, possibly including Carolyn McAdoo on right, seated on sofa in interior with abstract painting and champagne glasses on end table
